DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Body mass index ( BMI ) : lean , 1926 kg/m2 ; obese , 3040 kg/m2 2 . Availability transportation 3 . Ability sign inform consent form Exclusion criterion : 1 . Medication supplement ( i.e . amino acid , protein ) know affect protein metabolism 2 . Presence acute illness 3 . History liver disease 4 . Uncontrolled metabolic disease 5 . ECG document abnormality , atrial fibrillation , history syncope , limit unstable angina , congestive heart failure 6 . Chronically elevate blood pressure ( systolic , > 140 mmHg ; diastolic , > 100 mmHg ) 7 . Cardiac pacemaker medical device implant body 8 . Low hemoglobin hematocrit 9 . Current participation weightloss regimen , include extreme dietary practice 10 . Smoking 11 . Use anabolic steroid corticosteroid ( within 3 month )
